name: @sanofi-iadc/jival
description: Validation/health check tool for Jira workflows.

scripts.start: npx tsc && rm -rf dist/config && mkdir -p dist/config && cp -a ./src/config/. dist/config && node dist/index.js
scripts.build:package: rm -rf dist && npx tsc && rm -rf dist/__tests__

author: MeStrak
